title: My little brother sent his account to another region
body:
Can you help transfer it back riot? His user is david5942
And i think his account is in LAN or LAS... He transfered it by accident.

replies.body:
You have to hit confirm twice before completing a transfer, so I'm afraid we actually don't reverse these even if they're accidental. His transfer back will need to be purchased through the in-game store. If he can't purchase the currency on LAS, please have him send in a support ticket and we can facilitate the purchase. https://support.riotgames.com/

You can also check out the Transfer FAQ here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ
well, if your on the east coast, lan is better anyways.

>
> well, if your on the east coast, lan is better anyways.

i'm on west coast, plus its South :(
oh :( well, that does suck. Sucks that they also wont transfer it back either. The sad part is the fact they "won't" as opposed to they "can't".

:( well, least its free to make a new acct =/. Only other thing i can think of is wait till las has a free transfer to na week. Free transfers happen from time to time.
